boat.construction_details: Carvel, oak on oak, double framed. Larch spars.
boat.full_description: Stella Anne came out of fishing in 1997 and was abandoned in Brixham. She was bought from the harbour Authority and converted into a family cruising boat over 2 years in the Exeter Ship Canal. Subsequently she has cruised to South Brittany, Channel Islands, Scilly Islands and the West Coast of Scotland.
boat.name: Stella Anne

ownerships.note: Previous owner Jubilee Fishing Company, Grimsby
ownerships.text: Previous owner Jubilee Fishing Company, Grimsby

boat.short_description: Stella Anne is a MFV built as a Seine Netter in Esjberg but now converted for cruising.
